  Load packages and import data
```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, data.table, coloc, TwoSampleMR, ggpubr, 
               ieugwasr, rio, here)
source("code/Functions.R")
here::i_am("analyses/IL6ST.Rmd")
```


```{r}
IL6ST_pqtl <- import_data("data/export/IL6ST_prot_anno_TwoSampleMR.csv",
                          "data/export/IL6ST_T1D_TwoSampleMR.csv", 
                          has_beta=TRUE)
ggsave("figures/IL6ST-pqtl-manhattan-fig.png",
       height = 6, width = 6, units = "in")
```

## Manhattan plots

No GWAS hits in T1D. Coloc & MR is not done.
```{r}
manhattan_plots(IL6ST_pqtl, gene_start = 55230923, gene_end = 55290821, 
                title = "IL6ST")

```


## Coloc

```{r}
analyze_coloc_pqtl(IL6ST_pqtl)

```
